amendment.description: Amendment sought to create authority for the prudential regulators, the CFTC and the SEC, to set margin in swap and security-based swap transactions involving end users.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-370 to create authority for the prudential regulators, the CFTC and the SEC, to set margin in swap and security-based swap transactions involving end users.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 280 (Roll no. 957).
